Publisher name: URL to terms and conditions of webpage
Email address denoted at the contact page of the url
Email address of administrator as available from whois command
Whether it is an Open Access publisher (0 = no, 1 = yes)
Whether publisher provides a literature dump (0 = no, 1 = yes)
Whether the literature dump is freely available (i.e., no VPN, no login, no agreement; 0 = no, 1 = yes)
Whether publisher provides a TDM API (0 = no, 1 = yes)
Whether the TDM API is freely available (i.e., no VPN, no login, no agreement; 0 = no, 1 = yes)
Whether the T&C explicitly forbid scraping (0 = no, 1 = yes, NA = no T&C)
Whether the T&C explicitly forbid spidering/crawling (0 = no, 1 = yes, NA = no T&C)
